body_html:
@cg31 thanks for clarifying which tools generate which files. That was not clear to me. I figured that my attempt at replacing the files would not work, but tried anyway.

I looked around and found that files I need are actually generated when I build TF from source. They are buried deep in the bazel-out directory. So as a complete hack I copied the files I need from there. Definitely not a long-term solution, but it got me past this issue for now.

@cg31 thanks for clarifying which tools generate which files. That was not clear to me. I figured that my attempt at replacing the files would not work, but tried anyway.
I looked around and found that files I need are actually generated when I build TF from source. They are buried deep in the bazel-out directory. So as a complete hack I copied the files I need from there. Definitely not a long-term solution, but it got me past this issue for now.
body:
@cg31 thanks for clarifying which tools generate which files. That was not clear to me. I figured that my attempt at replacing the files would not work, but tried anyway.

I looked around and found that files I need are actually generated when I build TF from source. They are buried deep in the bazel-out directory. So as a complete hack I copied the files I need from there. Definitely not a long-term solution, but it got me past this issue for now.
